text: Berkeley Square is a 1933 American romantic fantasy movie. It was directed by Frank Lloyd. The movie is based on the play of the same name by John L. Balderston and also the incomplete book The Sense of the Past by Henry James. It stars Leslie Howard, Heather Angel, Valerie Taylor, Irene Browne, Beryl Mercer, and Alan Mowbray. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The movie did not make very much money in ticekt sales. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1934. In 1951 it was remade as I'll Never Forget You. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 romance movies Category:1930s fantasy movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Frank Lloyd Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies about inheritances Category:Movies set in the 1780s Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: Berkeley Square (movie)
